summary: During World War II, a teenage Jewish girl named Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding in the Nazi-occupied Netherlands.
cast: Rena Takahashi|Gô Katô|Fumie Kashiyama|Seiko Nakano|Jirô Sakagami|Tsuyoshi Kusanagi|Yûsuke Takita|Yoshie Taira|Tetsuko Kuroyanagi|Takurô Nakayoshi|Naomi Sekita|Gô Endô|Tôru Takeuchi|Keishi Kawaguchi|Hiroyuki Kawada|Riki Kagami|Tetsuo Maekawa
title: Anne no nikki
